attributes.action: prevent the change of roads outside cities to 20mph
attributes.additional_details: Many issues will arise, from increased spearing tickets, more greenhouse gasses in our atmosphere and for a longer period of time due to the slower travel. If a decrease is to occur from the 60mph, a drastic development to 20mph is uncanny. As 40mph is said to be the best speed for emoting the lease amount of greenhouse gasses and using the least amount of fuel, due to the laws of physics that it is then moving at almost constant speed.
attributes.background: To stop the movement to change rural roads to 20 miles per hour or ones within 5 miles of cities.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
